name: Midnight Extermination
description:
Its midnight at the space station but some bugs need taking out, get out there and do your job!

Controls:

WASD - to move

Left click to shoot

Scroll to change weapons

Modifications Made:

added new grass texture

added a health bar for boss

added new night time sky box
